document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 48''' was released in July/August of 1994. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

The Oracle at Sumbar.Locations:
:;Inns & Taverns: [[Reldegar's Roost]]
:;Island: [[Dragonisle]] • [[Sumbar]]
:;Realm: [[Cormyr]]
:;Region: [[Interior Faerûn]]
:;Sea: [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
:;Settlements: [[Suzail]] • [[Yhaunn]]
::{{Refonly}}
:[[Culhane]] • [[Mirtul]] • [[Sembia]]
